Subject: Restless
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He couldn't stay asleep. He walked to his desk, and sat. He activated a
holo projector. There was a holo picture of Optimus Prime, Ultra Magnus,
Springer, ArrCee, Gold Bug, Kup, and other Autobots, Aerialbots, and the
Dinobots, as well as himself. Tears of oil, and other mech fluids
appeared in his eyes, and ran down his cheek. It had been a long time
since he had looked at this, and saw his old friends. Many were
perminetly offline, or retired. These were the bots and friends that he
searved with, for millions of years. He clicked a switch, and a large
pic of Optimus Prime appeared. Hot Rod put his head in his hands, and
looked at the pic. He began talking in a wisper, to his former mentor,
teacher, and dearest friend.
"Hello, Optimus. It's been a long time." He went on for two hours,
before going to the CR room for a recharge. He looked for Feline.
"Hello? Honey?"
